Breadth-First.Explanation: General clue collection, focusing broadly on the street sign as an initial clue.

Depth-First.Explanation: Deep verification of the street sign by matching font and finish with UK signage databases.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Street sign font and enamel finish

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifying the specific hypothesis by matching photo details to Logic Lane, Oxford.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Logic Lane, Oxford (street name and architecture)

Depth-First.Explanation: Confirming location via Google Street View comparison of architectural details.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Stone facade, sign placement, electrical box and terracotta building

Depth-First.Explanation: Structuring the confirmed location into the required Neighborhood, City, Country, Continent format.
Refining the formal naming of the location with street name and continental designation.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Street name 'Logic Lane' and country/continent designation

Depth-First.Explanation: Final review of all clues to ensure alignment with online databases before concluding.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Street sign, building style, distant building confirmation

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad clue collection to focused verification of the street sign hypothesis.
